properties.areaDesc: Waters from Pt. St. George to Cape Mendocino CA from 10 to 60 nm
properties.headline: Gale Watch issued January 13 at 2:51AM PST until January 16 at 3:00AM PST by NWS Eureka CA
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Small Craft Advisory, west winds 15 to 25 kt
with gusts up to 30 kt and seas 12 to 16 feet. For the Gale
Watch, south winds 30 to 40 kt with gusts up to 50 kt and seas
14 to 19 feet possible.

* WHERE...Pt St George to Cape Mendocino 10 to 60 nm.

* WHEN...For the Small Craft Advisory, until 7 AM PST Wednesday.
For the Gale Watch, from Wednesday morning through late
Wednesday night.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds can cause hazardous seas which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds will become southerly today and
increase to 20 to 25 kt this afternoon before returning to
northwest tonight. Near gale to gale force southerly winds are
expected on Wednesday.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should consider altering plans to avoid possible
hazardous conditions.  Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter
course, and/or secure the vessel for severe wind and seas.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM PST WEDNESDAY... ...GALE WATCH IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY MORNING THROUGH LATE WEDNESDAY NIGHT
